recipes.name: Idly
method: Soak urad dal and idly rice separately.
Grind them to a smooth batter.
Mix and ferment overnight.
Steam in idly molds.

recipes.name: Dosa
method: Soak urad dal, rice, and fenugreek seeds.
Grind them to a smooth batter.
Ferment overnight.
Spread on a hot griddle to make dosas.

recipes.name: Pittu
method: Mix rice flour and grated coconut with salt.
Steam the mixture in cylindrical pittu molds.

recipes.name: Biryani
method: Cook basmati rice separately.
Prepare the chicken or vegetable curry.
Layer rice and curry in a pot, and cook together.

recipes.name: Masala Tea
method: Boil water and tea leaves together.
Add spices and milk, simmer.
Strain and add sugar to taste.

recipes.name: Idiyappam
method: Mix rice flour, water, and salt to form a dough.
Press through a mold to create strands.
Steam idiyappam.

recipes.name: Appam
method: Mix rice flour, coconut milk, yeast, and sugar.
Ferment the batter.
Cook appams in special pans.

recipes.name: Poori
method: Mix wheat flour, water, and salt to form a dough.
Roll into small discs and deep fry.

recipes.name: Poondi
method: Mix rice flour, grated coconut, and salt.
Shape into small dumplings and steam.

recipes.name: Pani Puri
method: Prepare small puris from semolina.
Make a hole and fill with spiced water, tamarind chutney, potatoes, and chickpeas.

recipes.name: Potato Fries
method: Peel and cut potatoes into thin strips.
Heat vegetable oil in a pan for frying.
Fry the potato strips until golden brown and crispy.
Remove from the oil, sprinkle with salt and black pepper.

recipes.name: Rasagulla
method: Boil milk and curdle it using lemon juice or vinegar.
Strain the chenna and knead it into a smooth dough.
Make small balls from the dough and boil in sugar syrup.
Let them soak until they absorb the syrup, then cool and serve.

recipes.name: Samosa
method: Boil and mash potatoes, then mix with peas and spices.
Prepare a dough with all-purpose flour and water.
Roll out the dough, fill with the potato mixture, and shape into triangles.
Deep fry until golden brown and serve with chutney.

recipes.name: Momo
method: Mix ground meat, chopped onions, ginger-garlic paste, and soy sauce.
Prepare a dough using flour and water.
Make small dumplings with the meat mixture and steam until cooked.
Serve with dipping sauce.

recipes.name: Gulab Jamun
method: Mix khoya, paneer, and flour to form a smooth dough.
Shape the dough into small balls and deep fry until golden brown.
Make sugar syrup with water, sugar, and cardamom powder.
Soak the fried balls in the sugar syrup and serve.

recipes.name: Paruppu
method: Boil toor dal with turmeric powder until soft and mushy.
In a pan, heat oil, add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, garlic, and curry leaves.
Add the cooked dal to the tempering and simmer until flavors meld.
Serve with rice or flatbread.

recipes.name: Spaghetti
method: Boil spaghetti noodles in salted water until al dente.
In a pan, saut√© minced garlic in olive oil, add tomato sauce and basil.
Toss cooked spaghetti in the sauce, garnish with Parmesan cheese, and serve.

method: mix all ingredients
